entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Mirabel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 p.m. EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon then changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
